comment: Don't dwell on such things. You're good enough. I know this is tough. I know it's easy to blame yourself, don't do it. If you think there's changes you should make then you can work towards those. If not just be yourself.
amr:
# ::snt Don't dwell on such things. You're good enough. I know this is tough. I know it's easy to blame yourself, don't do it. If you think there's changes you should make then you can work towards those. If not just be yourself.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / dwell-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :mod (s / such)))
      :snt2 (g / good-02
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)
            :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 y2
                  :ARG3 (e / enough)))
      :snt3 (k / know-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (t2 / tough-02
                  :ARG1 (t3 / this)))
      :snt4 (d2 / do-02
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (ii2 / it))
      :snt5 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (w / work-01
                  :ARG0 y3
                  :ARG1 (t4 / thing
                        :mod (t5 / that)))
            :condition (t6 / think-01
                  :ARG0 y3
                  :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
                        :ARG1 (c / change-01
                              :ARG0 y3
                              :ARG1 y3))))
      :snt6 (p2 / possible-01
            :ARG1 w
            :ARG0 y3
            :ARG1 t4)
      :condition (h2 / have-mod-91
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 y3
            :ARG2 y3
            :mod (j / just)))
